You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesJ J] > &jukcy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Jukcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0404/index.htm U+00404].
  * `&jukcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0454/index.htm U+00454].
